channel.title: [Hire Me!] Victor Felder
channel.description: Before subscribing to this feed, please read the following explanation: https://vhf.github.io/blog/2016/02/02/fixing-hiring-through-rss/

item.title: I'm looking for a job!
item.description:
I am looking for a job. I'm a web backend software engineer. I work mostly with JavaScript, Python and Elixir. I am willing to relocate anywhere.
My email address is displayed on my github profile, https://github.com/vhf
I am a passionate software engineer. I enjoy diving deep into the technologies at hand, sharing knowledge and contributing to open source infrastructure. Although my last jobs were in big data, I am still fascinated by the field I have been exploring for the past 10 years: the web. Reading the ECMAScript spec, explaining strange V8 behaviours by digging into its codebase, getting hands-on experience with promising technologies such as Elixir...
